message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $180 to start.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $140.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $160?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $160 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. If you can meet me there, we have a deal.
